arts.ttl: Neymar says Mbappé was jealous of Messi in Paris, adds that player egos hurt PSG's performances
arts.sum: Striker Neymar said his former Paris Saint-Germain teammate Kylian Mbappé became “a little jealous” after superstar Lionel Messi joined the French club in August 2021 in a free transfer. Speaking in a podcast hosted by World Cup winner Romário released Thursday, the 32-year-old Brazilian who plays for Saudi club Al-Hilal added that big egos affected the performances of PSG in big matches.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah contract update: Liverpool star eyed as Neymar heir in summer transfer window
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah is reportedly set to be the subject of a monumental offer from abroad, with the Liverpool star set to leave Anfield for free at the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Chicago Fire in Neymar talks to end Saudi stay
arts.sum: Chicago Fire are in talks with striker Neymar over a surprise move to the MLS.

arts.ttl: Neymar stuns MLS with Messi contract DEMAND
arts.sum: Neymar’s contract is set to expire in the summer but Al-Hilal are willing to terminate it early, leading to an approach from Chicago Fire to sign the forward. The MLS side met with Neymar’s father in Europe, as well as his advisor Pini Zahavi, and are willing to offer a contract similar to Messi’s at Inter Miami.

arts.ttl: Neymar wants to earn more than Messi at Miami: see his extraordinary demands
arts.sum: Recent reports suggest that Neymar and his team are already in discussions with three MLS clubs, including Inter Miami and, surprisingly, the Chicago Fire, who have expressed interest in signing the Brazilian forward in what would be a sensational coup for Gregg Berhalter’s side . According to the information, Neymar is seeking a salary higher than Lionel Messi’s; according to the MLSPA, he earns $20.4 million annually with Inter Miami.

arts.ttl: Neymar sends personal message to Barcelona’s Lamine Yamal
arts.sum: Former Barcelona star Neymar Jr. has this week moved to reveal his appreciation for current Blaugrana talent Lamine Yamal. Wide-man Lamine has of course seen his name take its place…

arts.ttl: Mo Salah's mega-money Liverpool exit hinges on Neymar as three clubs hold talks
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah has enjoyed had a blistering season with Liverpool after netting 18 goals in 20 Premier League games but looks certain to leave for nothing as things stand, and a move to the Middle East has been heavily mooted

arts.ttl: Chicago Fire Among Three MLS Clubs Reportedly Linked With Neymar Jr Transfer
arts.sum: Neymar is in talks with three MLS teams, including Chicago Fire, regarding a possible transfer from Al Hilal.

arts.ttl: Neymar opens talks to ruin dreams of Inter Miami and Messi
arts.sum: Neymar ’s much-anticipated reunion with Lionel Messi at Inter Miami could be on the rock with the shock news that another MLS franchise is moving to sign the Brazil international attack. Neymar opens talks to RUIN dreams of Inter Miami and Messi

arts.ttl: Al Hilal ready to offer Salah lucrative deal to replace Neymar
arts.sum: Al Hilal are ready to offer Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah a lucrative contract if he wants to leave Europe and play in Saudi Arabia.
